page.title: 13 CLUBS
page.content: Two second year groups completed the Birmingham schools questionnaire and produced the following results about clubs to which members of their families belonged. 13 families belonged to no clubs at all. The most mentioned clubs were: the Fox Hollies Forum, a local youth club,to which 9 families belonged, Cubs,Brownies,Scouts and Guides,which had members in 8 families, 7 families had joined sports clubs, Various local working men's clubs, including the one in Tyseley,which was mentioned by 6 families. Other clubs mentioned were the Indian Committee,Cannon Hill club,The British Legion and the Conservative club.
